title: Fungal Diversity and Key Functional Gene Abundance in Iowa Bioretention Cells: Implications for Stormwater Remediation Potential

Stormwater bioretention cells are green stormwater infrastructure systems that can help mitigate flooding and remove contaminants. Plants and bacteria improve nutrient removal and degrade organic contaminants; however, the roles of...
